text: "Do It like a Dude" is the debut single by English singer-songwriter Jessie J. The song was released as the lead single from her debut album, Who You Are (2011). It was released as a download in November 2010 in the United Kingdom with a CD release in January 2011. It peaked at number two on the UK Singles Chart and in Scotland too, number eight in New Zealand and Belgium, and number eleven in Ireland. "Do It like a Dude" was awarded Best Song at the 2011 MOBO Awards. ==Background== "Do It like a Dude" was written by Jessie J under her real name of Jessica Cornish, George Astasio, Jason Pebworth, Jon Shave, Kyle Abrahams and Peter Ighile Jessie J had wrote the song originally for Barbadian R&B; singer Rihanna because Rihanna's song "Rude Boy" was released at the time that Jessie J began to write it, She played the song to her label, Island Records, before sending it to Rihanna's management. Island then wanted the song to become Jessie's J first single, as they thought it was "amazing". Jessie J has said that she would like to perform the song live with Rihanna as Jessie J thinks that Rihanna "would kill it." ==Track listings== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2010-11) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 66 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2011) Position UK Singles Chart 24 ==Certifications== Country Certification New Zealand Gold United Kingdom Platinum ==Release history== Region Date Label Format United Kingdom 18 November 2010 Universal Republic Digital download Australia 26 November 2010 United States 7 December 2010 Germany 18 March 2011 CD single ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pop rock songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Jessie J songs
title: Do It Like a Dude
